requiredFiles.description: The encryption key to access credentials

envSample.name: email_username
envSample.description: The email from which emails will be sent

envSample.name: email_password
envSample.description: The password for access to the email; in case of 2FA accounts, generate an app-password

envSample.name: email_dev_username
envSample.description: The email to receive a control copy

envSample.name: email_conexao_username
envSample.description: The email to receive Conexao-related emails

envSample.name: CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGIN
envSample.description: Allowed address for CORS blocks

envSample.description: The address of the targeted audience for JWT

envSample.name: JWT_SECRET
envSample.description: The secret key to generate JWT

envSample.name: JWT_ISSUER
envSample.description: The address of the issuer of JWT

envSample.name: CSV_MAX_PARTNERS
envSample.description: Max number of partners allowed for Company Update CSV
